Judul: Selenium removal from petroleum refinery wastewater using an electrocoagulation technique
Abstrak:
In the present work, an electrocoagulation technique was tested as a possible technological alternative for the
treatment of selenium in wastewater from a petroleum refinery. For this purpose, a batch airlift reactor with air
stirring was used. The sacrificial electrodes were made of iron to generate the necessary ferrous ions for the
process. The results indicated a selenium removal of 90% from the wastewater after 6 h of treatment, achieving a
decrease in concentration from 0.30 mg L?1 to 0.03 mg L?1. The current density was found to be an important
variable for the process. In conclusion, the electrocoagulation process seems to be a feasible selenium removal
technique applied to petroleum refinery wastewater.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Sebastián Franco Peña., Claudia Gutiérrez.,Andrea Lazo., Pamela Lazo.,Lisbeth M. Ottosen
Kata Kunci: Selenium Electrocoagulation Oxidizing medium Current density Iron hydroxides
